Hello, I'm **Anna, Shiyu Tao**. I was born in *Fujian* in *Mainland China* and then went to *Hong Kong* to pursue my undergraduate study in accounting and finance. During that time, I also attended a semester exchange in *The University of Manchester* and a summer exchange in *The University of British Columbia*. Both were amazing experiences and I'm very looking forward to the journey in **London Business School**! This is my [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/anna-shiyu-tao).

Besides, I love reading, Chinese painting, playing piano, swimming and travelling! I am also a foodie and always attracted by different kinds of food.
